titles.title: Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017
To designate a mountain peak in the State of Montana as "Alex Diekmann Peak".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2017
This bill designates the 9,765-foot peak located 2.2 miles west-northwest of Finger Mountain on the western boundary of the Lee Metcalf Wilderness in Montana as "Alex Diekmann Peak."
